pr_title: Fixing code to fetch the fsConfig from the right parent

timeline.message: Fixing code to fetch the fsConfig from the right parent

timeline.bodyText: I see all non-test callers of this api are calling it with fsConfig. Is that expected? Would be good to add javadoc based on what we find.
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: its called with fsFactoryConfig, renamed the variable.
replies.author: kishoreg

timeline.bodyText: Let's not log the configs probably as they might contain sensitive content (e.g. password)
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.message:
Pinot fs bug fix (#5674)

* Fixed missing registration for Hadoop JobRunner

* Caused by Phase 1 of configuration refactor

* Fixed base configuration constructor for PinotConfiguration

* Fixed the PinotConfiguration constructor that accepts a Commons
Configuration.
* Full test coverage of PinotConfiguration
